Description.Text: Facilities Travellers are welcomed at the hotel, which has a total of 121 rooms. The establishment features a dining area, a bar, a conference room and a business centre. Those arriving in their own vehicles can leave them in the car park of the accommodation. Rooms A range of amenities complete the standard fittings of the accommodation units. Features of the rooms include WiFi. The hotel offers family rooms and non-smoking rooms. Meals Bed and breakfast is bookable.
